title: Dear Apple, Can We Get a Treadmill Desk Workout Mode?

media:group.media:title: Dear Apple, Can We Get a Treadmill Desk Workout Mode?
media:group.media:description:
We really need a treadmill desk workout mode for Apple Watch!

I'm enjoying using the treadmill desk but would really like to know how many steps and what distance I'm doing. Unfortunately the Apple Watch doesn't have a mode to track the activity while I'm using the treadmill desk. 

Learn more about my custom keyboard here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UKfeJrRIcxw&list=PLCZYyvXAdQpte8dkCPz72m_O-Od9fVEqD

See my thoughts on Apple Watch Ultra here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KUbigJVMD_s
